div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1082px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1149px; margin-left: 10px;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 405px; margin-left: 241px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Manage games: create game pages, upload game packages, game commetns

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Manage user profiles, full name, description, avatar

div.b:
Manage games metadata,
versioning, game related
comments

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 630px; margin-left: 340px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(64, 64, 64); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

div.b:
Upload games, games screen shots,
videos etc.
